review_blob: Golden straw color, pours perfectly with a good head, Such a nice balance and pleasant aftertaste. Tried it a beer-tasting locally 6 weeks ago and have been a fan ever since. My lady friend agreed to this tasting, too. Will be buying regularly.

I cant recall last years version of Octoberfest but this years is one of the tops Ive tasted from Sam Adams, a perennial fave company of mine. The clean, rich toasty malty taste and the aroma are well crafted. It strikes the proper blend or balance. Id categorize it as sweet but not overly so.

During todays college football game watching I sampled 2 cold ones. Ive a lady friend who sampled mine and she was blown away by it also. Another friend of ours then sampled hers when she ordered. Ive not seen such unanimity in a long while about a beer taste.
